title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Designing Handheld Computer-Based Scientific Inquiry Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of real-time data collection and analysis for science experiments using handheld computers.
Learners can design science inquiry scenarios according to activity structure-based instructional methods.
Learners can develop learner-centered science class operation plans integrating various digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
